definition: to sequester/to seize (assets)/to seal up/to close down
see 山查[shan1 zha1]
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
surname Feng
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

sentences.english: If you try to walk away from the mortgage, the bank will come after your personal assets.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人試圖賴賬，銀行便會查封他的個人資產。

sentences.english: They may seize and impound suspect products.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以查封並扣押可疑產品。

sentences.english: The 232-room hotel, which is almost empty, will be next.
sentences.chinese: 如今空置的有232房間的酒店也即將被查封。

sentences.english: All those underground plants that manufacture piratic CDs must be closed down.
sentences.chinese: 所有制造盜版光盤的地下工廠都必須查封。

sentences.english: What kind of evidence do you need to seize goods for patent infringement?
sentences.chinese: 在查封侵權產品時，上海海關需要什麼證據？

sentences.english: The tsarist government closed down the newspaper in December 1905.
sentences.chinese: 沙皇政府在1905年12月查封了這家報館。

sentences.english: Machine-gun posts were set up at important points, and the wireless stations were seized.
sentences.chinese: 要害地點都架設了機槍，無線電臺也被查封。

sentences.english: Did you feel that your work in those years was censored or otherwise inhibited?
sentences.chinese: 您覺得在那些年代您的作品受到審查或查封嗎？

sentences.english: They had come to repossess their goods.
Confiscate and seal income and silver gained by sale two?
sentences.chinese: 查封所得以及拍賣所得的銀兩呢？

sentences.english: Bailiffs need a certificate from the county court to seize goods for rent arrears.
sentences.chinese: 查封官需要有郡法院的證明才能沒收貨物以抵欠租。

sentences.english: This is a log of user blocking and unblocking actions .
sentences.chinese: 這裏記錄了用戶進行查封和解封的操作。

sentences.english: The new air conditioner is getting into the air, a small amount of CFCs has been sealed.
sentences.chinese: 新的空調已經進入到空氣，少量的氯氟化碳已被查封。

sentences.english: Talk The sysop ability to create range blocks is disabled.
sentences.chinese: 只有管理員才能創建禁止查封的範圍。

sentences.english: The sysop ability to create range blocks is disabled.
sentences.chinese: 只有管理員才能創建禁止查封的範圍。

definition: to detain/to hold in custody/to distrain/to seize property
to seize/to confiscate
(of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case
to investigate thoroughly/to carefully inspect/to verify/to ferret out (undesirable elements)
to order/to enjoin/to charge/to instruct sb to finish sth
to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
legal (proceedings)/according to law
subpoena/to summon (for questioning)
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
unlicensed business activity
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to detain/to arrest/to hold/to confiscate
person who has failed to fulfill a court order
to detain (a prisoner)/to keep sb in custody
